strapiPost.title: Farmer's Choice
strapiPost.content:
The Farmer’s Table Cafe in Fayetteville is another one of Northwest Arkansas’ great local restaurants serving farm-fresh fare. 

  • Quality care: The Farmer’s Table Cafe is environmentally conscious with all of its ingredients being from small and local family farms that are chemical free. The kitchen is zero-waste and everything is made in small batches so as to keep meals tasting perfect. 
  • Recognization: The cafe is located in South Faytteville and has a quite literal homey setting. The restaurant was recently recognized by ShermansTravel as the Best Place to Eat in Arkansas. The seasonal sweet potato pancakes are a must try.

For more information, click HERE.
